title: Emerald Companion
description: Revised and Expanded EditionEmerald Companion is a collection of poetry, prose and aphorisms on heartbreak, healing, self-discovery, spirituality, and rising in love. Fragments that were written during the highs and lows of life, flow harmoniously throughout the book as compiled in their own sections. As a relatable, empowering, and inspirational book filled with gems of wisdom, Emerald Companion is a must have for all poetry lovers. And it gets even better with coffee.
author: Suhaib Rumi
